name: Orientation Library

screenshots.caption: Reference and crystal coordinate systems, Cs and Cc.

short_description: The Orientation Library is a collection of routines for rotation/orientation manipulation. It ranges from general tools to others for crystal orientations. It is written in C and is well-documented. An interactive program enables to run the routines.
